content: last chain single_crochet in next single_crochet half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet double_crochet in each of the next 6 single_crochet skip slip_stitch and one single_crochet of round 14 sl st in next single_crochet  repeat from * 2 times more round 16 in back loops of round 14 single_crochet around 18 legend round 17 24 single_crochet around 18 round 25 single_crochet decrease repeat around 12 round 26 single_crochet around 12 round 27 decrease around 6 round 28 single_crochet around 6 fo leave a long yarn tail stuff banana close the hole and weave in loose ends embroider/glue on eyes embroider mouth and apply cheeks enjoy your amigurumi banana  free crochet pattern for personal use you may not share translate copy or publish this pattern for private use only no commercial use
